overview_of_class: An introductory course in chemistry that deals with: elements and compounds, basic chemical calculations, mole problems, stoichiometry, concentrations of solutions, gas laws, thermochemistry, introductory quantum mechanics, electronic structure of atoms, periodic properties of elements, and introductory nuclear chemistry.
name: General Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 101-0-01 General Chemistry
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students registering for Chem 101-0 01 at 9AM must also register for Chemistry 121-0 01 at 9AM.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An introductory course in chemistry that deals with: elements and compounds, basic chemical calculations, mole problems, stoichiometry, concentrations of solutions, gas laws, thermochemistry, introductory quantum mechanics, electronic structure of atoms, periodic properties of elements, and introductory nuclear chemistry.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Students enrolled in this course MUST also enroll in the associated laboratory course, Chem 121-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. General Chemistry: Principles and Modern Applications by Petrucci et al., 11th Edition, Pearson, ISBN 9780134097329 ($312.65 new; $234.50 used)*
2. Turning Technologies Model QT or NXT Response Card ("Clicker") and associated 1 year license ($55.00 new; $41.25 used)*
3. Access to Sapling Learning Course Site (Details to be provided on first day of class) ($27)
4. Scientific Calculator, any model (Starting at $10)

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.

class_attributes:
